data.text: N ma di, xa i n ma masenyie suxu,
xa i i tuli mati lɔnni ra, xa nɔndi rafan i bɔɲɛ ma,
xa i xaxili fanyi fen, xa i nɔndi maxili,
xa i a fen alɔ gbeti, xa i a fen a fanyi ra
na kui, i Alatala xa yaragaaxui kolonma nɛ,
barima Alatala nan lɔnni fima,
A fe fanyi gbegbe ragatama tinxintɔɛe bɛ.
A mixi tinxinxi makantama,
Na kui, i nɔndi nun tinxinyi kolonma nɛ,
Lɔnni fama i bɔɲɛ nan ma,
xaxili fanyi i ratangama,
a i ratangama kira ɲaaxi ma,
naxee gbilenma tinxinyi kira fɔxɔ ra,
fe ɲaaxi rafanxi naxee ma,
naxee xa kira mu tinxin,
Lɔnni i ratangama nɛ ginɛ ɲaaxi ma,
naxan a xa xɛmɛ singe finsiriwalima,
A xa wali kobi a rabirama nɛ,
Mixi naxee birama a fɔxɔ ra,
A lanma i xa i ɲɛrɛ mixi fanyie nan ma kira ra,
Mixi tinxinxie luma nɛ yi bɔxi ma,
kɔnɔ mixi ɲaaxie tan ɲɔnma nɛ yi bɔxi ma,
